name: Blinding Sidestep
Mirage Step
ミラージュステップ
desc: Swiftly move a short distance by moving in deftly.

Active
Move forward a short distance.
軽快な動作で踏み込み短距離を素早く移動する

name: Advanced Dodge
Step Advance
ステップアドバンス
desc: Extends the duration of invulnerability during a Sidestep.

Passive
Extends the invulnerability during Step.
ステップ中の無敵時間を延長する

name: Dodge Attack
Step Attack
ステップアタック
desc: Allows you to attack while performing a Sidestep.

Passive
Allows you to perform an attack during a Step.
ステップ中の攻撃アクションが可能となる

name: Perfect Recovery
Just Reversal
ジャストリバーサル
desc: Allows you to quickly jump up after being knocked back onto the ground.

Passive
Press the jump button to quickly recover when knocked down.
吹き飛ばされてダウンしたときにジャンプ操作で素早く起き上がる

name: Perfect Recovery PP Gain
J Reversal PP Gain
JリバーサルPPゲイン
desc: Recovers PP when a Perfect Recovery is activated.

Passive
Recover PP when using Just Reversal.
ジャストリバーサル発動時に、PPが回復するようになる

name: Crafting Mastery
Craft Mastery
クラフトマスタリー
desc: Grants a bonus to your equipment stats when you equip a crafted weapon or armor.

Passive
Gain a bonus to your equipment's status when equipping crafted weapons or armour.
クラフト武器や防具を装備すると装備のステータスにボーナスを得る

name: Bouncer Mag
Bouncer Mag
バウンサーマグ
desc: Adds a set percentage of an equipped Mag's Dexterity to Melee Power and Technique Power.

Passive
Adds S-ATK and T-ATK by a fixed rate depending on the DEX of your equipped Mag.
装備しているマグの技量から一定割合を打撃力と法撃力に加える

name: Arms Enthusiast: Bouncer
Rare Mastery Bouncer
レアマスタリーバウンサー
desc: Boosts the damage you deal when a weapon of Rarity 10★ or greater is equipped.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
When equipped with a ★10 or higher weapon or crafted weapon, gain a damage bonus.
Main class only.
レアリティ★10以上の武器を装備していると、打撃力と法撃力が上昇する。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Dexterity Up 1
Dexterity Up 1
技量アップ1
desc: Boosts your Dexterity.

Passive
Increase your DEX.
技量が上昇する

name: Tech. Power Up 1
Technique Up 1
法撃アップ1
desc: Boosts your Technique Power.

Passive
Increase your T-ATK.
法撃力が上昇する

name: Melee Power Up 1
Striking Up 1
打撃アップ1
desc: Boosts your Melee Power.

Passive
Increase your S-ATK.
打撃力が上昇する

name: Melee Power Up 2
Striking Up 2
打撃アップ2
desc: Boosts your Melee Power.

Passive
Increase your S-ATK.
打撃力が上昇する

name: Soaring Blades Focus
Dual Blade Gear
デュアルブレードギア
desc: Boosts the potency of your Photon Arts based on Focus level and makes it possible to consume the Focus Gauge to throw Photon Blades at the enemy with a Weapon Action. Further attacks against the area hit by your Photon Blades will boost PP recovery.

Passive
Charge gear whenever you attack. Using your weapon action will hurl photon blades towards your enemy and consume gear. Attacking pinned parts will increase your PP recovery.
攻撃を当てるとギアが溜まり、武器アクションでギアを消費して敵にフォトンブレードを飛ばす。刺さった部位に対しての攻撃はPP回復量が上昇する

name: Jet Boots Focus
Jet Boots Gear
ジェットブーツギア
desc: Bonus Focus when you successfully land an attack or charge a Technique. Applies the element of the last technique you charged to your weapon and boosts attack potency.

Passive
Charge gear whenever you attack or charge a technique. Increase the power your attacks and change your weapon's attribute to the one of your last charged technique.
攻撃を当てるかテクニックをチャージするとギアが溜まる。武器の属性が最後にチャージしたテクニックと同じ属性になり、攻撃の威力が上昇する

name: Critical Field
Critical Field
クリティカルフィールド
desc: Deploys a field around you that boosts your critical rate.

Active
Create a field around yourself that increases critical rate.
自分の周囲にクリティカル率が上昇するフィールドを発生させる

name: Elemental PP Restorate Field
Elemental PP Restorate F
エレメンタルPPリストレイトF
desc: Deploys a field around you that increases PP recovery when you connect an attack exploiting the enemy's Elemental Weakness.

Active
Create a field around yourself that increases the amount of PP recovered by attacks using an enemy's attribute weakness.
自分の周囲に、エネミーの弱点属性で攻撃を当てた場合PP回復量が上昇するフィールドを発生させる

name: Heal Sharing
Heal Share
ヒールシェア
desc: When you recover HP, surrounding characters will also be healed by a set percentage of the amount of HP you recovered.

Passive
When recovering HP, heal surrounding players by a fixed percentage of the original healing.
HPを回復した際、回復した値の一定割合分、周囲のキャラクターを回復する

name: Healing Bonus
Heal Bonus
ヒールボーナス
desc: Grants a recovery bonus when you recover HP.

Passive
When recovering HP, gain a bonus to the recovered amount.
HPを回復する際に回復量にボーナスを得る

name: Deband Attack PP Restorate
Deband Attack PP Restorate
デバンドPPリストレイト
desc: Boosts the PP recovery of Normal Attacks while Deband is in effect.

Passive
Increase the amount of PP recovered by normal attacks during Deband.
デバンド効果中、通常攻撃によるPP回復量が上昇する

name: Shifta Air Attack Boost
Shifta Air Attack Boost
シフタエアアタックブースト
desc: Grants a damage bonus to attacks performed in the air while Shifta is in effect.

Passive
Gain a damage bonus to mid-air attacks during Shifta.
シフタ効果中、空中での攻撃にダメージボーナスを得る

name: Photon Blades Escape
Photon Blade Escape
フォトンブレードエスケープ
desc: Activates a period of invulnerability when you move while using Photon Blades.

Passive
Gain invulnerability to the movement after photon blade usage.
フォトンブレード使用時の移動に無敵時間が発生する

name: Photon Blades Fever
Photon Blade Fever
フォトンブレードフィーバー
desc: Doubles the number of Photon Blade attacks while in effect.

Active
During the effect duration, double the amount of fired photon blades.
効果時間中、フォトンブレードの発射数が倍になる

name: Photon Blades Fever Up
Photon Blade Fever Up 1
フォトンブレードフィーバーアップ1
desc: Increases the potency of your Photon Blades while Photon Blade Fever is in effect.

Passive
Increase the power of photon blades during Photon Blade Fever.
フォトンブレードフィーバー中、フォトンブレードの威力がアップする

name: Switch Strike
Jet Boots Strike
ジェットブーツストライク
desc: Causes attacks performed using Jet Boots to be executed using Melee Power.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Active
Jet boots exclusive skill. Change jet boots attacks so that they are influenced by your S-ATK.
Main class only.
ジェットブーツ専用スキル　ジェットブーツによる攻撃を打撃力によって行うように切り替える。このスキルはメインクラスのみ有効

name: Elemental Burst
Elemental Burst
エレメンタルバースト
desc: Triggers an elemental blast which can inflict a status ailment when a Weapon Action cancels an Element stored in your Focus Gauge. Jet Boots Focus required.

Passive
When the attribute obtained by the gear is released with your weapon action, cause an attribute explosion that has a fixed chance to apply a status abnormality. Only takes effect if Jet Boots Gear is learnt.
ギアに保存された属性を武器アクションで破棄した時、属性爆発を発生させ、一定確率で状態異常が発動する。ジェットブーツギア習得時のみ有効

name: Rapid Boost
Rapid Boost
ラピッドブースト
desc: Greatly boosts your Jet Boots PA charge speed while in effect. Also slightly boosts your Technique charge speed.

Active
For a certain time, increase Jet Boots PA charge speed.
効果時間中、ジェットブーツの攻撃速度とテクニック・PAのチャージ速度上昇

name: Rapid Boost JA Bonus
Rapid Boost JA Bonus
ラピッドブーストJAボーナス
desc: Jet Boots only. Grants a potency bonus to Perfect Attacks performed during Rapid Boost.

Passive
Just Attacks during Rapid Burst gain a power bonus.
ラピッドブースト中のジャストアタックに威力ボーナス

name: Break Stance
Break Stance
ブレイクスタンス
desc: Active Stance skill that increases the damage you deal to destructible body parts. Renders Elemental Stance ineffective.

Active
Stance which increases damage when attacking breakable parts.
部位破壊可能箇所へのダメージが増加するスタンススキル

name: Break Stance Critical
Break S Critical
ブレイクSクリティカル
desc: Boosts your critical hit rate when you attack a destructible body part while Break Stance is active.

Passive
During Break Stance, increase your critical hit rate when attacking breakable parts.
ブレイクスタンス中、部位破壊可能箇所へ攻撃した際にクリティカルヒット確率が上昇する

name: Break Stance Up
Break Stance Up 1
ブレイクスタンスアップ1
desc: Grants a damage bonus when you attack a destructible body part while Break Stance is active.

Passive
During Break Stance, gain a damage bonus when attacking breakable parts.
ブレイクスタンス中、部位破壊可能箇所へ攻撃した際にダメージボーナスを得る

name: Elemental Stance
Elemental Stance
エレメンタルスタンス
desc: Passive Stance Skill that boosts damage dealt when you exploit an enemy's Elemental Weakness with a Technique, or when you attack the enemy with a weapon that has an Element the enemy is weak against.

Active
Stance which increases the damage when attacking an enemy with a weapon of its attribute weakness and casting techniques of weak attribute.
エネミー弱点属性武器で攻撃した時と、法撃で弱点属性へ攻撃したときのダメージが増加するスタンススキル

name: Elemental Stance Critical
Elemental S Critical
エレメンタルSクリティカル
desc: While Elemental Stance is active, boosts your Critical Hit Rate when you exploit an enemy's Elemental Weakness with a Technique, or when you attack the enemy with a weapon that has an element the enemy is weak against.

Passive
During Elemental Stance, increase your critical hit rate when attacking an enemy with a weapon of its attribute weakness.
エレメンタルスタンス中、エネミーの弱点属性武器で攻撃した際にクリティカルヒット確率が上昇する。

name: Elemental Stance Up
Elemental Stance Up 1
エレメンタルスタンスアップ1
desc: While Elemental Stance is active, grants a damage bonus when you exploit an enemy's Elemental Weakness with a Technique, or when you attack the enemy with a weapon that has an element the enemy is weak against.

Passive
During Elemental Stance, gain a damage bonus when attacking an enemy with a weapon of its attribute weakness.
エレメンタルスタンス中、エネミーの弱点属性武器で攻撃した際にダメージボーナスを得る

name: Field Remain
Field Remain
フィールドリメイン
desc: Maintains a field effect for a set time even outside the area of effect of a field used by the learner. Only effective for fields that produce player-enhancing effects.

Passive
Maintains the effect of fields for a fixed period of time for players that have left your field.
習得者が使用するフィールドの効果範囲外に出ても、一定時間フィールド効果が維持される

name: Break Stance D Bonus
Break S D Bonus
ブレイクSDボーナス
desc: Makes the skill (Break Stance] effective against areas that can't be destroyed while Soaring Blades are equipped.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
When equipped with D Blades, the effect of Break Stance also takes effect on non-breakable parts.
Main class only.
Dブレード装備時、スキル「ブレイクスタンス」の効果のみが破壊可能箇所以外にも有効になる。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Jet Boots Escape
Jet Boots Escape
ジェットブーツエスケープ
desc: Makes you invulnerable for a period of time when you perform a Normal Attack or Photon Art while Jet Boots are equipped.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
When using Jet Boots, makes you invincible during PA and normal attack Shift Actions.
Main class only.
ジェットブーツ装備時、PAの派生を行った時に無敵時間が発生する。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Jet Boots Focus Boost
Jet Boots Gear Boost
ジェットブーツギアブースト
desc: Boosts the increment by which your Focus Gauge increases due to attacks while Shifta or Deband are in effect and Jet Boots are equipped.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
Increase the gear gauge increase rate for attacks while under the effect of Shifta or Deband when equipped with jet boots.
Main class only.
ジェットブーツ装備時、シフタ及はデバンド効果中、攻撃によるギア増加量が上昇する。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: Encore Jump
One More Jump
ワンモアジャンプ
desc: Allows for an additional jump to be performed when you land a <something> attack using 1 Focus Gauge accumulation or while performing a Normal Attack or Photon Art with Jet Boots equipped.
This skill can only be used with a Main Class.

Passive
Allow another jump if the second jump hits an enemy while Jet Boots Gear is active.
Main class only.
ジェットブーツギア蓄積時に2段ジャンプでエネミーを踏むと、再度ジャンプが可能になる。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される

name: High Level Bonus Bo
High Level Bonus Bo
ハイレベルボーナスBo
desc:
Passive
Gain a bonus to damage inflicted.

Passive
Gain a bonus to damage inflicted.
プレイヤーが与えるダメージにボーナスを得る

name: Dodge Auto Field
Dodge Auto Field
ドッジオートフィールド
desc:
Passive
When dodging with Mirage Step, all learnt fields are deployed automatically. The cooldowns of the respective skills is unaffected.
Main class only.

Passive
When dodging with Mirage Step, all learnt fields are deployed automatically. The cooldowns of the respective skills is unaffected.
Main class only.
ミラージュステップで回避時、習得したフィールドが自動発動する。スキルのリキャストは発生しない。このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される。

name: First Arts Perfect Attack Addition
First Arts JA Addition
ファーストアーツJAアディション
desc:
Passive
Turns your first attack into a Perfect Attack. A cooldown is applied after activation. Doesn't affect Harmonizer attacks, pet attacks, or Techniques.

Passive
First attack becomes a Just Attack. Cooldown begins after activation. Takt, Pet Attacks and Techs do not apply.
最初に放つ攻撃が、ジャストアタックになる。発動後にリキャストが発生する。タクトやペットの攻撃とテクニックは無効

name: Double Jump
Next Jump
ネクストジャンプ
desc:
Passive
Enables two-stage jumping.

Passive
Enables two-stage jumping.
２段ジャンプが可能になる

name: Sidestep Jump
Step Jump
ステップジャンプ
desc:
Passive
Jumping during a Dodge Action transitions you into a dash.

Passive
Jumping during a recovery action switches to sprinting.
回避アクション中にジャンプを行うことでダッシユ状態へ移行する

name: Air Reversal
Air Reversal
エアリバーサル
desc:
Passive
Allows you to perform a break-fall while in the air.

Passive
Enables recovery midair.
空中で受け身がとれるようになる

name: Perf. Recovery & ATK Combo
J Reversal JA Combo
JリバーサルJAコンボ
desc:
Passive
Makes Perfect-Attack timing apply after a Perfect Recovery.

Passive
The Just Attack circle appears after Just Reversal.
ジャストリバーサル後にジャストアタックタイミングが発生

name: Sidestep & Perf. ATK Combo
Step JA Combo
ステップJAコンボ
desc:
Passive
Makes Perfect-Attack timing apply during a Sidestep.

Passive
The JA circle appears during Step.
